com.baidu.voicerecognition.android.ui

类 SDKAnimationView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.baidu.voicerecognition.android.ui.SDKAnimationView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    NoProGuard

    public class SDKAnimationView
extends View
implements NoProGuard
    音量反馈动画类，动画分为三个步骤(preparing, recording, recognizing)
    作者:
    liuxi04
